title: Are smartphones killing cameras?
description: Do people still buy cameras when everybody is keen on selfies?

vocabItems.definition: something that has been replaced and is no longer the first choice
(metaphor) used about, for example, sales numbers, it means sales have fallen significantly over a short period of time
opt for somethingchoose somethingget into somethingbecome very interested in an activity
do something at a higher level
